xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
# Workspace Manager translation page workspacemanager.pluginnotenabled=The Workspace Manager java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the file 'wiki30-components-workspace-manager-<version>.jar' is present under the 'webapps/xwiki/WEB-INF/lib/' folder. workspacemanager.template.install.success=Workspace template has been successfully installed. workspacemanager.template.install.error=Error installing workspace template. {0} workspacemanager.template.install.error.missingattachment=Error installing the workspace template. The file "{0}" is not attached to the document [[{1}>>{1}]]. Please re-import the [[{1}>>{1}]] document from the Workspaces Application XAR. workspacemanager.template.install.error.missingtemplateattachment=Error installing the workspace template. The file "{0}" is not attached to the document [[{1}>>{1}]]. Please attach a base template that will be used for all newly created workspaces. You can download one from [[here>>{2}]] and rename it to "{0}" before attaching it. workspacemanager.template.install.notYetComplete=The installation process is not yet complete.\n\ \n\ In order to finish the installation process, please log in as Admin and go to the page [[{0}>>{0}]]. workspacemanager.translations.install.success=Workspace Manager translations have been successfully installed. workspacemanager.searchSuggestions.install.success=Workspace search suggestions have been successfully installed. workspacemanager.install.notallowed=Admin rights are required to complete the Workspace Manager installation. Please login as Admin to complete the installation. workspacemanager.dependencies.wikimanager.missing=The [[Wiki Manager Plugin>>http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Wiki+Manager+Plugin]] is not installed. Please install it and try again. workspacemanager.dependencies.applicationmanager.missing=The [[Application Manager Plugin>>http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Application+Manager+Plugin]] is not installed. Please install it and try again.
# LABELS workspacemanager.createworkspace=Create a new workspace workspacemanager.members=MEMBERS workspacemanager.title.createwiki.wikiname=Workspace identifier workspacemanager.title.createwiki.desc=Workspace description workspacemanager.title.createwiki.members=Initial workspace members workspacemanager.title.join=Join Workspace workspacemanager.title.leave=Leave Workspace "{0}" workspacemanager.title.leave.empty=Leave Workspace workspacemanager.title.delete=Delete Workspace "{0}" workspacemanager.title.delete.empty=Delete Workspace workspacemanager.browse=Browse Workspaces workspacemanager.browse.emptyvalue=N/A workspacemanager.browse.wikiprettyname=Name workspacemanager.browse.description=Description workspacemanager.browse.owner=Owner workspacemanager.browse.membershipType=Membership Type workspacemanager.browse._actions=Actions workspacemanager.browse._actions.join=Join workspacemanager.browse._actions.requestJoin=Request Join workspacemanager.browse._actions.viewInvitation=View Invitation workspacemanager.browse._actions.cancelJoinRequest=Cancel Request workspacemanager.browse._actions.leave=Leave workspacemanager.browse._actions.delete=Delete workspacemanager.menu.create=Workspace workspacemanager.menu.mainwiki.admin=Administer Main Wiki workspacemanager.menu.workspace.mainWiki=Main Wiki workspacemanager.menu.workspace.index=Workspace Directory workspacemanager.menu.workspace.delete=Delete workspacemanager.menu.user.workspaces=Workspaces workspacemanager.profile.category.workspaces=Workspaces
# MESSAGES workspacemanager.wikiprettyname.error.empty=Pretty name must not be empty workspacemanager.successcreatewiki=Your workspace \"{0}\" has been created. You can access it at the following address: {1} workspacemanager.errorcreatewiki=Workspace \"{0}\" creation failed: {1}. workspacemanager.errorcreatewiki.ERROR_WM_WIKIALREADYEXISTS=This workspace \"{0}\" already exist. Please choose another name. workspacemanager.install.translations=The translations page has been automatically registered in XWiki's preferences. workspacemanager.error.workspacedoesnotexist=Workspace [{0}] does not exist workspacemanager.wikiname.error.databasealreadyexists=A database with this identifier already exists workspacemanager.wikiname.error.wikialreadyexists=A wiki with this identifier already exists workspacemanager.wikiname.error.workspacealreadyexists=A workspace with this identifier already exists workspacemanager.wikiname.error.empty=Identifier can't be empty workspacemanager.wikiname.error.alreadyused=This identifier is already used workspacemanager.error.notinvirtualmode=The current XWiki installation is not in virtual mode. This means you can only access the main wiki. Make sure you have <tt>xwiki.virtual=1</tt> in the <tt>xwiki.cfg</tt> file.
# PROPERTIES workspacemanager.prop.wiki.wikiname=Workspace Identifier workspacemanager.prop.wiki.wikiprettyname=Pretty Name workspacemanager.prop.wiki.description=Description workspacemanager.prop.wiki.server=Alias workspacemanager.prop.wiki.owner=Owner workspacemanager.prop.workspace.membershipType.label=Membership Type
# DOCUMENTATION workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.wikiname=The unique identifier of the new workspace. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.desc.wikiprettyname=The display name of the workspace. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.desc.description=A brief description of the workspace and its purpose. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.desc.owner=A user who will have all the rights on the workspace. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.members=The users that can participate in the workspace.\n\ Tip: Use CTRL+Click to select multiple users. workspacemanager.prop.workspace.membershipType.hint=The way users can join this workspace.
## Group sheet. To be removed once it gets into platform. xe.admin.groups.comment=About xe.admin.groups.tags=Tags xe.admin.groups._actions.follow=Follow xe.admin.groups._actions.unfollow=Unfollow
